content: {"name": "Sacred Souls United Church of Christ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "If you'd like to make a request for food, please call (980) 301-5863 on or before Wednesday leaving your name and number to schedule your food pick-up.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/SacredsSoulsCommunutyChurchUcc/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2127 Eastway Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Windsor Park", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28205", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2269066, "longitude": -80.77478479999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(980) 301-5863", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
